column3: â€œStrongly Indica-dominant hybrid.  Very sedating.  Not a cerebral high.  Excellent back pain relief and sleep aid!â€

â€œBlack Ice provides a nice relaxing sedative kind of high. Perfect for anyone with insomnia or stress, this strain will definitely put you down. This strain is a definite choice for anyone looking to relax and completely melt into the seat or bed.â€

â€œHere's the deal, Black Ice is a heady mother F'r. You feel it in your head pretty fast, making you relaxed and a  little heavy headed. As your brain matter thickens and coagulates, you loose most rational thought and worries as your thick head spreads to your shoulders and neck. Within an hour or so the only thing you want is sweet sweet sleep and it doesn't disappoint. Dry ass mouth and some munchies accompany this ...â€
â€œI thought it was going to put me to sleep,but it gave me a clear head ....good draw,its going to be one of my favorite..â€

â€œThis is my favorite night time strain. Smooth and tasty. It's kinda like taking a warm bath right before bed, very relaxing and helps you sleep through the night.  No hangover-type of effects in the morning.â€
â€œThis strain is now my favorite.  Very cool dark color buds, sedating effect.â€

â€œI really enjoy the taste. a bit flowery, almost like an herbal tea. A little goes a long way for me, a daily smoker. I feel a nice numbing sensation, a relaxing of my muscles, a very mellow buzz. does make me a bit dryâ€
â€œThe smell of the black ice is amazing! The batch I got was testing at 25% but I don't place to much value on thc levels. Will get some more for sureğŸ‘ğŸ¼â€
â€œGood bud. I got anxious the first time I smoked it but other than that its great, relaxing weedâ€

â€œBlack Ice:( Black Domina x Ice-Widow)
Maybe slightly differnt, Ice-Widow is a IcexWW hybrid.
Look: Extremly dense, lime green buds with thick bright barney purple streaks and fire red hairs, covered with a heavy shell of trichs, rock hard. Beautiful.
Smell/Taste: A rich complex mix of purply berry and sweetness, not distinct but very nice, taste is similar.
Effects: Total relaxation, the first couple hits punch you h...â€

â€œI found this strain disappointing as a pre bedtime smoke. There was not much of a head effect and the body effects only lasted an hour or so. Judging by other reviews, maybe I had a far too early harvested batch.â€

â€œThis is a HIGHLY sedative strain. My #1 Indica strain. Puts me to sleep every time. I recommend this strain if you need to relax and go to sleep. Great for insomnia. I smoke this strain on occasion after work and even on my weekends.â€

â€œgreat relaxing high. kept your mind clear but defantally couch locked. 
pain relief and muscle relaxing effects.â€
â€œPretty good, nothing extraordinary thoughâ€
â€œAmazing Strain. started growing him myself since he is so good!â€

â€œPotent and relaxing, a nice solid basic indica. Not sure if this characteristic, but my bottle was full of tight tiny buds. Smooth smoke with not much flavor. Moderate relief from pain and inflammationâ€

â€œPotent and relaxing, a nice solid basic indica. Not sure if this characteristic, but my bottle was full of tight tiny buds. Smooth smoke with not much flavor. Moderate relief from pain and inflammationâ€
â€œPretty good, nothing extraordinary thoughâ€
â€œAmazing Strain. started growing him myself since he is so good!â€

â€œI found this strain disappointing as a pre bedtime smoke. There was not much of a head effect and the body effects only lasted an hour or so. Judging by other reviews, maybe I had a far too early harvested batch.â€

â€œgreat relaxing high. kept your mind clear but defantally couch locked. 
pain relief and muscle relaxing effects.â€

â€œjust had a j of this stuff. its definitely not bad but I also dont have anything extraordinary to say about it either. it was a nice smooth smoke with a decent taste along with s n uplifting high.â€
â€œThis strain is the ultimate insomnia cure. Wonderful.â€
â€œGreat body relaxing buzz.. Good for chilling or bedtime..â€
â€œVery sleepy and relaxed. Medium/long lasted. ABV test tomorrowâ€
â€œI like this one as something to put me to sleep and that it does well.  Otherwise, it's just not a stand-out.â€

â€œThis was like getting solidly smashed in the face w a big purple dreamy pillow... it hit hard but felt so good. The high THC makes this not for the beginner or feint of heart but if u like powerful sedating indicas this is for you. Now I'm trying to get more!â€

â€œWanted to re-do my review now that I've had Black ice wax.
Form: crumble
THC: 78%

To this day this strain gives one called F'n Incredible a run for it's money. Black ice is the most sedating indica out there for me, I have yet to find another indica strain that can beat it. 
I have a disgusting tolerance; I go thru a quarter to half gram of wax a day. With this gem I only need 2 dabs to be down & out. Lulled to slee...â€
â€œgood strain recommended for sleep and pain reliefâ€

â€œMoon Seeds has Black Ice listed as Black Domina X White Widow.
Regardless if it's crossed with WW or Ice I was not impressed with it.
The buds were nice and dense, and had a nice smell to it (like hay) and the taste was spicy in a way. The high was average to me, nothing about it stood out. It gave a nice body stone that isn't overly heavy and it didn't have much of a head high to talk about. For the avergae smoker I...â€

â€œThis one went on sale so I got to try it and realize after I medicated it was nice smooth berry and earthish. Recommend this one it was mixed with og  and is fire . my pains and my anxiety are subdued .â€

â€œSmells and tastes very hashy. Helps my headaches, sleep, and apatite. Wish it helped my back, neck, and shoulder pain a bit more but it does help ease the pain. Very relaxing high. Sits me on the couch but doesn't make me feel like I have to stay there. Still able to be very focused and active when needed. Over all a great strain.â€

â€œThis is one of my new favorite strains. I suffer from sever arthritic pain and this strain has been great for my pain. Also, it brings on some intense relaxation which is great for the muscle spasms. It does make you sleepy, but I've still been able to work just fine on it. All in all, this is a great strain if you just want to relax, chill, and escape from pain for a little bit.â€

â€œA powerful and sedative stone. I smoked a 1/2g joint of this and was asleep within an hour. Taste wasn't much, just a little earthy if anything. It was a freebie from a local dispensary. I doubt I'd buy this unless I needed something to put me to sleep.â€

â€œNot my favorite by any means. Repeated uses have created the same effects; cloudy but pleasant effects mentally. Heavy but not completely draggy in the body. Not enough illuminating effects and not enough physically pleasant effects either.â€
â€œI really enjoyed this strain.  Perfect for before bed, had me sunk into the recliner with nice couch lock.  Very relaxing, nice buzzâ€

â€œNot usually an Indica guy, but thought I'd try it to ease some back pain. 
Definitely an Indica. I'm currently stuck in my chair contemplating the feasibility of hover-recliner technology. 
Plenty of cerebral effects to show its Sativa ghost. 
Will try again.â€
â€œDefinitely sedating. Also gives the munchies. Night time strain for sure.â€
â€œVery relaxing. Tastes good. Definitely an indica hybrid. Iâ€™d buy again.â€

â€œThis is a HIGHLY sedative strain. My #1 Indica strain. Puts me to sleep every time. I recommend this strain if you need to relax and go to sleep. Great for insomnia. I smoke this strain on occasion after work and even on my weekends.â€
â€œDid this come from across the border? It's terrible. The staff is awesome though and I love that the flower isn't pre packaged.â€

â€œIn a word - powerful. As fuck. I suffer extreme pain from arthritis and fibromyalgia and this is amazing. My whole body is relaxed and tingly like a warm blanket, and it's much stronger than the percocet I took earlier for the pain. I'm not couch locked but I'm very relaxed and (gasp) comfortable even. Everything is just very pleasant and stress free. I'm in love! I'm not able to sleep yet though, so I'm going to inc...â€
â€œThis is a good late night strain. Helped this insomniac sleep. Helped reduce stress and anxiety. Tasted earthy with licorice. The way it tasted I knew it would help me sleep. Smooth smoke.â€
â€œThis is a fire mixture of blackberry kush and ice... this shit will make you feel the euphoria of blackberry while at the same time need to be active that you experience from iceâ€
â€œExactly what i look for in an Indica. An always consistent, euphoric head high with beautiful smelling buds.â€
â€œGreat nighttime meds. Great relaxing heavy Stoney high and perfect for lightening your mental load.â€

â€œMy favorite night time strain. Smoke this when you don't have to leave the house. It puts me to sleep and eases my anxiety and PTSD. It's great for sex as well. 

The smell and taste is amazing. My favorite tasting strain. It's piney and sweet. A pleasure to taste and smell. 

It's middle of the road as far as potency is concerned. I'm a regular smoker with an average to low tolerance. A bowl before bed is perfect fo...â€
â€œPerfect for getting ready to sleep.â€

â€œThis strain was one of the most beautiful strains I have ever saw period, especially if your like me and you like purple shit. If you like purple shit like me then this bud is as pretty as it gets bc it has not just purple but also black, orange, green, even white hairs in a truly mystical specimen. This strain is great for relaxing and sleeping as it is an indica with a pretty solid THC level to back it up. From top...â€

â€œtried this strain to relieve my tennis elbow and now i can't feel anything other than my thumb and index finger holding this phone ....
24 %Thc ,  loving itâ€
â€œI did not like this strain at all. it smelt like garbage weed I used to get when I was a kid.â€
â€œloved this strain. one of my fav strains ! totally keeps me chill and relaxed throughout my dayâ€
â€œWas disgusting and tasted moldy! I am never getting it again..â€
â€œgood taste nice night medicineâ€
â€œnot badâ€
â€œSlept G R E A T! Smell is LOUD!â€

â€œI have to say Black Ice is the only strain in a long time that I really don't want to have again.  I didn't care for the strong peppery taste that burned my throat.  And that probably would have been doable" except I really didn't get a buzz from this.  Not sure why
column4: but this strain just isn't for me.â€"
